name: Bathymetry
description: Depth of the seafloor

name: East/West aspect
description: East/West Aspect (sin(aspect in radians))

name: North/South Aspect
description: North/South Aspect (cos(aspect in radians))

name: Plan curvature
description: Plan curvature is the curvature in the direction perpendicular to the maximum slope and indicates whether flow across a surface would diverge (positive values) or converge (negative values).

name: Profile curvature
description: Profile curvature is the curvature in the direction parallel to the maximum slope and indicates whether flow across a surface would accelerate (positive values) or decelerate (negative values).

name: Distance to shore
description: Distance to shore

name: Bathymetric slope
description: Bathymetric slope was measured in degrees ranging from 0º (flat surface) to 90º (vertical slope).

name: Concavity
description: Concavity is the second derivative of the bathymetry layer (or the slope of the slope) and represents whether a raster cell is on a hill (negative values) or in a valley (positive values).

name: Annual potential evapotranspiration
description: A measure of the ability of the atmosphere to remove water through evapotranspiration processes, given unlimited moisture

name: Thornthwaite aridity index
description: Index of the degree of water deficit below water need

name: Climatic moisture index
description: A metric of relative wetness and aridity

name: Continentality
description: Average temp. of warmest month - average temp. of coldest month

name: Emberger's pluviothermic quotient
description: A metric that was designed to differentiate among Mediterranean type climates

name: Growing degree days (> 0° C)
description: Sum of mean monthly temperature for months with mean temperature greater than 0°C multiplied by number of days

name: Growing degree days (> 5° C)
description: Sum of mean monthly temperature for months with mean temperature greater than 5°C multiplied by number of days

name: Maximum temperature coldest month
description: Maximum temperature coldest month

name: Minimum temperature coldest month
description: Minimum temperature coldest month

name: Month count temperature > 10°C
description: Count of the number of months with mean temp greater than 10?

name: PET coldest quarter
description: Mean monthly potential evapotranspiration of the coldest quarteré

name: PET driest quarter
description: Mean monthly potential evapotranspiration of the driest quarter

name: PET seasonality
description: Monthly variability in potential evapotranspiration

name: PET warmest quarter
description: Mean monthly potential evapotranspiration of the warmest quarter

name: PET wettest quarter
description: Mean monthly potential evapotranspiration of the wettest quarter

name: Thermicity index
description: Compensated thermicity index: sum of mean annual temp., min. temp. of coldest month, max. temp. of the coldest month, x 10, with compensations for better comparability across the globe
